name: Ballooned!
description:
BEFORE YOU BUY: 

Ballooned! is a multiplayer racing game where you can troll others with funny powers to defeat them and became #1. Rules are easy: Reach the given high in the given time, BUT what makes it really hard?

 Everybody can choose funny abilities that can help you troll others, and if you use them rightly, you can be at the top of the leaderboard. Each match got 10 players, and you can claim XP at the end of one, so you can buy different skins. 

CONTROL:

A or D: Change the camera's view.

RIGHT ARROW: Decrease your balloon's speed.

LEFT ARROW: Increase your balloon's speed. 

MUSIC: 

I used some amazing music to make the game more fun...

In the match: TheFatRat - Fly Away (Only Instrumental)

In the main menu: TheFatRat - Epic (Jackpot EP Track 2)
